subject: Re: to draw attention away from...........
msgSnippet: ... You might have to write it in kanji rather than romaji. ... The various Myochin groups made some small, thick guards, but this doesn t really look like
messageBody:
--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, "Jim Gilbert" <jggilbert@...>
wrote:
>
> Is Milt actually taking the high road, or did he not get the joke?
You might have to write it in kanji rather than romaji.
>
> Pretty hard to make an attribution much better than Inu no Oshiko.
The various Myochin groups made some small, thick guards, but this
doesn't really look like their work.
>
> Excuse me in advance for encouraging those involved.
> Jim
>

me taking the moral highground ? NEVER !!
Coming from -t, there must be a joke hidden somewhere..........

Dr. Lewitt spent some time in putting the whole koshirae together to
fit the age of the sword......the menuki is particularly fine

milt
